alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Morongo Basin; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 12 at 2:34AM PDT until June 12 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PDT/MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM PDT/MST today. * IMPACTS...Tree limbs could be blown down from gusty winds and a few power outages may result. Reduced visibilities on area roadways possible due to blowing dust.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Morongo Basin; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert
